name: S2019 Building Sandwiches
description:
Description

Are you ready for the next step in video game evolution? Are you ready to have your mind melted as beautifully crafted pixel art and jaw-dropping mechanics take you on a journey of digital discovery? If you are, then this is the place for you. In this game of tense trials and troublesome tribulations, you are the one and only Gialupi Giargany: Italian man and sandwich constructor extraordinaire. Play through 10 levels of increasingly challenging sandwich assembly, each level whackier than the last, as you seek to please customers and build the good name of your sandwich studio, The Po' Boys Next Door. If you hope to make it out alive, you'll have to combine brains and brawn in the ultimate item dropping/stacking experience. Think you're ready? Instructions are found in-game. The download link is below.
